> [[ Underground: Averron Observatory – Test Chamber // Neutral Territory // PVP Disabled ]]

It's an immaculate white room, past a marble door on one of the upper floors, close to where you rescued Nel from the room of dolls. The room opens up onto a small observation terrace; stairs on either side, with sliding barricades available, lead down onto a large, circular floor.

A large capsule, flush with the floor in the center of the room, contains a homunculus—you shudder instinctively, before you note its utter lack of features. It's not Velika; rather, it's just a blank humanoid slate.

“Hello, milord.” A pair of stout, spear-wielding wolf-like creatures in full lamellar stands guard, one on either side of the entrance. “Let us know if you'd like to charge a usage fee for this place; those things aren't cheap. And if you'd like to stop a test, just have someone down on the floor shout 'STOP'. The louder, the better.”

A holographic console screen emerges in front of you as you arrive in the middle of the room.

> [[ Observatory Test Chamber ]]
* SAFETY: Enabled
* DIFFICULTY: Test Dummy
* ARMED OPPONENTS: Enabled
* SPELLCASTING OPPONENTS: Disabled
* PVP: Disabled
> [[ Options ]]
* Set Difficulty: Test Dummy // Initiate // Veteran // Gladiator // Demon
* Enable/Disable Armed Opponents/Spellcasting
* Enable/Disable PVP
* Start Battle
> [[ Administrator ]]
* Enable/Disable Safety
* Set Number of Opponents: 1 (max. 5)

> Start a test battle, just to see how it works.
> Play with the settings and start a battle. (Write-in.)
> Chat with the guards.
> Leave the Test Chamber.
